content: During the quarter, we closed 1,547 homes, a decline of 38.1% primarily related to lower community count and absorptions compared to last yearâs record comp. As Eric noted, 443 of our closings were sold through our wholesale business, representing 28.6% of our total closings compared to 433 homes or 17.3% of our total closings in the same quarter last year. Revenue in the third quarter was $547 million, a decline of 27.2% from last year, primarily driven by fewer home closings and partially offset by a 17.6% increase in our average selling prices to $353,635. Gross margin this quarter was 28.5%, a 160 basis point improvement over the same period last year and a new third quarter record. Adjusted gross margin this quarter was 29.5%, a 130 basis point improvement over the same period last year and also a new third quarter record. Combined, selling, general and administrative expenses for the third quarter were 11.2% of revenue compared to 8.6% during the same period last year. EBITDA for the quarter was $113.7 million or 20.8% of revenue, representing a 270 basis point improvement over the same period last year and a new third quarter record. Pre-tax net income was $108.7 million or 19.9% of revenue, a 300 basis point improvement over the same period last year and a new third quarter record.
